name: Spelling Zombie Shooter
description:
Game created for Ludum Dare 41. The theme was "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres", so this is a combination of a spelling "educational" game and a zombie shooter.

Good at spelling?

Great at killing zombies?

Why not flex both skills... simultaneously!

Spell words by killing zombies in the right order! Watch out for the other zombies: they might be harmless (for now), but killing them in the wrong order will cost you spelling points.
